Dwayne Turner (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ) bụ onye America na-ese akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị na onye na-ese ihe na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri na egwuregwu vidio.
Turner malitere ọrụ ọkachamara ya na ngwụsị afọ 1980 mgbe ọ ka nọ na kọleji na School of Visual Arts.
Ọ malitere na Marvel Comics na utu aha ndị dị ka Avengers Spotlight na Transformers
Maka DC, o dere Power of the Atom limited series na 1988
Na-esonyere onye edemede Marcus McLaurin na inker Chris Ivy, Turner dere ọtụtụ n'ime mbipụta iri na abụọ mbụ nke Marvel's Cage title na 1992–1993
N'afọ 1995, ya na onye edemede Chris Claremont kere aha Sovereign Seven maka DC Comics
N'afọ 1992, ya na onye edemede Marcus McLaurin kere James Lucas maka Marvel Comics
N'afọ 1993, ya na onye edemede Gerard Jones kere Hulk 2099 maka Marvel Comics
N'afọ 2001, ya na onye edemede Alex Simmons kere Orpheus maka DC Comics
N'afọ 2003, ya na onye edemede Joe Kelly kere Traci Thirteen maka DC Comics
Turner rụrụ ọrụ na ọtụtụ aha nke Todd McFarlane's Spawn, na ogologo oge na usoro ntụgharị nke Curse of the Spawn site na 1996 ruo 1999
Ọ bụ onye na-ede akwụkwọ na mpịakọta 2 nke Wildstorm's The Authority na 2003–2004.
N'ịhapụ ụlọ ọrụ na-eme ihe nkiri na 2006, Turner arụọla ọrụ na egwuregwu vidio na ihe nkiri
Dị ka onye na-ese onyinyo akụkọ, ihe nkiri ya gụnyere Tron: Legacy, Oblivion, na The Jungle Book
Ọrụ egwuregwu vidio ya gụnyere Halo franchise, God of War franchise, na Gears of War
